statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ -6 \\ 5 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 8 \\ -2 \\ 18 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ 22 \\ 34 \\ -22 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ -6 \\ 5 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 8 \\ -2 \\ 18 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ 22 \\ 34 \\ -22 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
